verbose_text: Additionally, its role in the regulation of calcium absorption is well known; vitamin D participates in the activity of beta-cell endopeptidases dependent on calcium and can act through two main pathways, directly inducing beta-cells to secrete insulin through an increase in intracellular calcium concentration through Ca channels or by mediating beta-cell calcium dependent activation to facilitate conversion of pro insulin to insulin [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: vitamin D participates in the activity of beta-cell endopeptidases dependent on calcium and can act through two main pathways, directly inducing beta-cells to secrete insulin
